flaws.name: Touchy Gyros
flaws.effect: When using the Boost action, must pass an agility check or become prone.

flaws.name: Unreliable Hydraulics
flaws.effect: The mech may not use the Brace action.

flaws.name: Slow Targeting System
flaws.effect: When using overwatch, all attacks suffer from +1 Difficulty.

flaws.name: That’s Not What I Printed…
flaws.effect: Something very strange has happened during your print. Details will be provided by the GM.
